content.description: Sit start at the base of the low long boulder behind the start of Koala Cling, traverse left along the lip using good slopers until you can swing your feet to good edges out left and then rock over at the top and end of the traverse.
content.protection: 2-3 pads, traversing through the rocky alcove
content.location: Starting at the entrance of the REM boulders alcove, directly opposite to the start of Koala Cling. Traverses left along the lip of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start at the bottom of the arete, pull on with bad feet and make one big move up into the seam, match it up and then make an easy move up to the lip and then rock over the top of the boulder.
content.location: Left side of the REM Boulder, at the sharp arete.

content.description: Sit start at the bottom of the face on small crimps; pull on with bad feet and make a reach up to the horizontal seam midway up the wall, taking care to avoid the boulder off to your right. From the crimp, match up or pull through and reach on up with the left to another good edge. From here bring up the feet and make an easy reach up to the lip of the boulder and finish with an easy mantle.
content.protection: 2-3 pads, landing in the alcove is a bit tight.
content.location: Starting to the right of Koala Cling, starting down in the pit and climbing up and out, avoiding the boulders on either side of the small alcove.

content.description: The REM boulder is a small little alcove hosting several problems squeezed in below the Lost Crag.
